DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to find out whether the use of medications that suppress acid in your stomach can change the composition of your bowel bacteria.
DOC.brief_title: Proton Pump Inhibitors and Dysbiosis in Cirrhosis
DOC.criteria: Cirrhosis or healthy controls not on current PPI or acid suppressive therapy No systemic antibiotics or probiotics On systemic antibiotics On PPI or acid suppression therapy already unable to give informed consent Allergy to proton pump inhibitors
